name: May The Best Coots Win
description:
Sorry theres a bug where the game stops working after the 3rd round, it will be fixed after the rating period

Made in 10 days for Ludwig jam with the theme Coots (his cat) and 10 minute game. Welcome to the illegal undeground cat fighting arena where you need to 1v1 another cat to see who is the best coots

Includes
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Extreme gameplay depth (totally)
Controls
  • Everything with the mouse
Credit
  • Programmer: PepperBoi
  • Coots Art: JamalCreates
  • Other art/sound is from Kenney

Join the Discord
